website_summaries.verdict: Though smaller than others on our list, they go a long way – a count of 12 and a reasonable price, these hand-crafted bath bombs are the best deal available.
pros: A large pack of 12 individually wrapped bath bombs that are made by hand
Beautiful colors and lovely scents that linger
Earns praise for making skin feel soft
cons: A few consumers received sets with several crumbled balls

customer_reviews.title: I am basically a bath bomb connoisseur.
customer_reviews.text: I have a bathtub addiction and am a 5-6 night a week bathtubber so when I say I’ve tried all the bath bombs amazon provides, I’m serious. I keep going back to these, not only because of the price but because they actually work well. They don’t have all those annoying glitters and the scent actually sticks to your skin and serves a hydration purpose. I can’t say enough how much I love these over the 10-12 other brands I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Spa experience without breaking the bank!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bath bombs! One of the best purchases I’ve made on here. There’s such a great variety, and I love the scents and colors! And they make my skin feel soft while I’m soaking in the tub. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived as promised. The packaging was ok. ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as promised. The packaging was ok. My issue with this product is the feedback I got from my wife. After her relaxing bath she had to spend 10 minutes scrubbing the bathtub out because of the color bomb. She told me she would never use them again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my girlfriend for Christmas. Being a guy we don't know much about these, and to be honest I was sold by the price and the amount you get considering company's like lush are 3-10 bucks a piece. When I opened the shipping box I could smell them and they smelled great, the gf was super excited and tired one right away, she was super pleased and asked where I got them so she could order more.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler P.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this product at all. I was immediate disappointed when I opened the box and saw how small they are but decided to keep an open mind and try them. They barely turn the water colors. The scent is so mild it is barely noticeable and they don't make my skin soft at all. I bought these because I was hoping for a lower cost alternative to what I normally use but now I see that you definitely get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: m. smith

customer_reviews.title: Best bath bombs!
customer_reviews.text: I could smell greatness as soon as I picked Up the package yesterday. I couldn’t wait to try one out so I drew a bath last night. The green tea lemongrass was AMAZING! This company by far has the BEST bath bombs.
customer_reviews.author: C Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Dead bugs in the Bath Bombs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Bath Bomb set for my wife for Christmas. When she opened the package to place one of the bombs in the tub, there were dead bugs lodged inside of the bath bomb. We inspected the rest of the bombs and about half of the bombs had dead bugs and dirt also. Not sure how this could happen but it was quite disgusting to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Wonder product AND customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love bath bombs, but have to be careful about the products I use because of sensitive skin/psoriasis. I ordered these based on reviews. Unfortunately when the box came, only 4 out of the 12 bombs were completely intact, the rest were either total residue or partially falling apart. This was not a result of the actual product, but more packaging and rough handling. I emailed the company and they immediately sent another set. The wait was worth it. These bombs smell great, do not stain, and leave your skin so soft! I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey the great

customer_reviews.title: I was blown away!
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the first box as I gift I had to order more. I am a true bath person and have tried bath products across the globe. I can honestly say that these are the absolute best bath bombs I have ever used! The fragrance is incredible and my skin is left soft not oily. Here comes the part that blew me away. No residue or ring left in my tub! One more thing, the price allows me to order more and give as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Sweet beautiful aromas in a bath bomb the dissolves and bubbles so nicely
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely great product... it's like a month's worth of private vacations! The aromas are so brilliant and they bubble and dissolve very nicely. I have tried several of the "other" popular bath bombs but these completely blow them away. They have a nice softening oil that colors the bath water and leaves you feeling young and beautiful. I would recommend these to anyone that is looking for that affordable gift that they will simply love and remember forever.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Yasss Queen!
customer_reviews.text: Smells AMAZING! Beautiful colors. Fun fizz. Great packaging/presentation. Good price. I feel smooth and smell great long after. No stain. I have sensitive skin and had no reaction. Would definitely buy again for myself or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Smell!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter for Christmas. They smell really good. The only problem is 2 of the bath bombs were a little broken. I think there should be some type of bubble wrap packaging or something to better wrap these awesome smelling bath bombs and offer that protection. It is nice that they are individually wrapped that way if you want to divide them up it is easier to separate them.
customer_reviews.author: Shark

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible - told my husband never to buy these again. They are dyed and when you put it in the tub it turns the water into a disgusting color. Didn't seem to stain but repulsive to get into bath water that looks black, orange, pink, etc... also does not feels any different than regular bath water i.e. no softner, etc. Will never buy again - threw the remaining bombs out. I would not even rate this as a one star item...
customer_reviews.author: Tom May

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I could smell them before I even opened the package, they smell wonderful! They were beautifully packaged and none of the bombs were broken during shipping. I’ve only tried one, the bright blue, and it did not disappoint. It fizzed nicely and turned the water very blue. It didn’t stain my skin or the tub and left a light feeling, mildly fragrant oil on my skin afterwards (like a moisturizer). I have no complaints and can’t wait to try the others!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: They bombed for sure 👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: These are a joke. Total waste of money because even at the discounted price they offer they’re absolutely useless & don’t smell like anything much less good or remotely close to what they’re labeled. They left a huge mess too, lots of residue & odd crap floating in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: RobReyJr

customer_reviews.title: Almost no fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sis for her birthday, as last year she raved about how wonderful these were. This time, 2 were crumbled, and there was almost no scent. Last time you could smell all the scents through the packaging. She said there was no scent left on her skin, and not much color in the bath either. Hopefully it was just a bad batch....
customer_reviews.author: Fawn D

customer_reviews.title: Dyes your tub...
customer_reviews.text: I love a good bath bomb/fizzy so I decided to try these. I have a nice white jetted tub and settled in with a strawberry Kiwi bomb... 1 hour i had a nice pink jetted tub. 3 hours of hard scrubbing later i regained my white tub... Scent 10/10 Dye 0/10
customer_reviews.author: Wynter

customer_reviews.title: Treat Yo Self!!
customer_reviews.text: Such great value!! I was so excited to stumble across these. I loved bath bombs from the first time I tried one, but had resigned to forego them due to the price, which can easily be $3-6 dollars per bomb at a store. Now I can treat myself without feeling guilty! The packaging is adorable and each bomb has its own unique smell and design. They were a bit smaller than I had imagined, but that's more my fault for not reading the description closely enough. I am definitely planning on using these for gifts in the future, and already recommended them to most of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly Fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for a friend who loves bath bombs. We finally have been able to get together for a late Christmas exchange & these were a huge hit. The fragrance is wonderful, the presentation is like ‘eye candy’ with the individual colors. All are individually wrapped in a nice box for gift giving. She’s definitely looking forward to using. I could have waited to write this review until she had actually used one, but she was so pleased with these, I decided not to wait. There were so many 5 star reviews from people who had used them, that I’m sure she will feel the same.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Too Fruity
customer_reviews.text: These look & smell pretty in the box but I just used a strawberry kiwi one & it was just an overwhelming sweet smell. It was also totally crumbled into pieces in the box. I washed my face with the water & it left an awful taste on my lips. Skin was very itchy after bath. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T Meyer II

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bath bombs for the first time. The packaging box and the bath bombs are so pretty and smell so good that they are great as a gift. The most amazing thing is the smell. The smell is so good! I left a bath bomb in the bathroom. The bathroom is full of this bath bomb smell. And this bath bomb is well soluble in water. After using bath bomb, my skin is very soft and moisturize. However, after using the colored bath bomb, the bathtub needs to be cleaned. There are some stains in the bathtub. But I’ll order this bath bomb again. I really like this bath bombs. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Love these bath bombs!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought a set of these bath bombs for my birthday in March. I liked them so much that I bought A 2nd set for myself! I have used other bath bombs and I didn’t expect much based on Those experiences, but these smell wonderful, for the entire time I’m in my bath and it colors the water in beautiful hues, which I love. I have a walk in tub and add additional moisturizers to my bath so I can’t speak on whether they are moisturizing but they are worth the expenditure for the visual and aroma therapy I experience.
customer_reviews.author: AuroraBorealis

customer_reviews.title: I pondered if I was man enough to walk around smelling like a rose! Sadly, I am not.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the shipment, all the bath bombs were in excellent condition. The first thing I noticed when I opened the package was the feminine aroma emanating from the box. While I expected the bath bombs would have some fragrance added; I didn't anticipate it would be so feminine in nature. I used the coconut and shea bath bomb and was very happy with the experience. I will distribute the rest to some ladies in my neighborhood. They will enjoy them! Even though I am a man, I do enjoy a good soak in the tub every now and again. Please come up with recipes that aren't so heavily fragranced for ladies.
customer_reviews.author: WW-Long Island

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these on multiple occasions. I am super picky about my bath bombs, and these are great. They smell AMAZING! They fizz very nicely and moisturize your skin perfectly. I will continue to buy these. I did see a review further back about a wife complaining she had to scrub the tub for 10 minutes. I have never had a problem with these. But I do keep my tub very clean. Maybe if you have soap scum build up, that build up could hold the color? I have no idea. These are not problematic with staining at all. My daughter has a vinyl insert and even the vinyl doesn’t get stained. She is also a returning customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Love the scents, subtle and natural. Not overpowering like many other bath bombs. Dissolve easily with no chunks. The only thing I wish is that there were scent choices. Even 3 different sets you could pick. I hate this one lemongrass tea and wish there was some way to switch out one or two. I love all the tropical/beach ones. Very fizzy, very moisturizing. The water is slightly colored and slightly bubbled but it’s not a bubble bath bomb, but tub will not have staining. My 4 yo son likes to pick out my bath bomb and dump it in the tub to watch it fizzle.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these bath bombs. I have sensitive skin and don’t react well to heavily scented or just scented products in general. I looked everywhere online for bombs that might work for me. I am so happy I purchased these. Over the last year I’ve almost finished my box and will buy a new one soon. Not only do I not react negatively to these but I feel sooo soft for days after using one! I love all the scents and the colors work beautifully as well. None have ever left a ring or stained my tub. But these!! And do yourself a favor and buy yourself one if you’re looking for a gift. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Missing a Bath Bomb
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that this product was missing a bath bomb. Instead of 12 it came with 11 instead. It is so close to Christmas that I cannot return in time. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Borges

customer_reviews.title: Messy packaging
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my friends son because she told me he was obsessed with them. Packaging was so poor that when i took it out, the box was POURING out bath bomb dust all over my kitchen. It was an absolute mess!!!!! I even got some in my eye! Wish they would seal them better, don’t know how I’m going to have a small child open this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi Cottone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality bath bombs!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the paper wrapping around the bath bombs! They are still individually wrapped, but without the frustrating piece of plastic to have to tear off. Also, paper is more environmentally friendly. They dissolve so pretty, fizzling in the water. These aren’t the cheap, dull ones that take forever to dissolve. A nice assortment of bombs, some having dried flowers in them. Beautiful, vibrant color and fragrances. The price is unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: NOYB

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased bath bombs for our daughter numerous times in the past for birthdays and holidays. They're kind of her thing. We were super excited to get these for her. The packaging was cute, variation great, but now that she's used one, she's broken out all over her face. She has no allergies so that isn't the case. I'm very frustrated that this product has done that to her when countless others haven't. I know today when it comes to skin, it's a very "to each their own", but this product greatly clogs the pores (I'm actually in skin care myself so I can identify these things). If you're getting these and have sensitive skin, beware.
customer_reviews.author: mbi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bath Bombs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughters birthday and she loves them. They each smell unique and they are lovely. They are packaged well and the care that they were made with is very apparent. The only reason I took off a star is because their scent is a bit too strong for my liking, which tended to give me a headache. But that may just be a personal thing. I do believe they are perfect for many people, just probably not people like me who are a little sensitive to perfumes and stronger aromas. But they are truly a beautiful gift to give or receive and I am very happy with my purchase. :)
customer_reviews.author: Marcie R

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent and color
customer_reviews.text: Great scent makes the whole bathroom smell nice. Good vibrant colors, haven't noticed any lasting discoloration on our tubs (even when my 3yr old put EIGHT of them in the tub, or even when the water sat in the tub overnight, lol don't judge me, or do, it doesn't matter, I don't know you). They generally fizz super quickly, so the excitement is over pretty quickly, and they're a bit pricey in my personal opinion, since they're mainly just for my kids, but since I know we like these scents and colors, I am nervous to try other more economic ones, having been disappointed a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Aromatic,Amazing and Beautiful Product!!! Love it! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond happy and excited with my purchase from Life around 2 Angels bath bombs!!! The box is just beautiful, well package and the smell on each one of them is Absolutely Amazing!!! I Love, Love, Love My purchase, and will definitely recommend this bath bombs from this seller 💯% they make a great gift for any bath/ spa lovers. I will buy again pretty soon! Thank You for your Amazing and Organic bath bombs Life Around 2 Angels!! ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awful
customer_reviews.text: I don’t get rashes easily at all, I mean at all, and I used 2 with no problems and like them. Then I used the pink and blue one, and I now itch and have itchy bumps on my body. I’ve never had this happen with a bath bomb and I’ve bought tons. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE ABSOLUTE BEST BATH BOMBS
customer_reviews.text: WE HAVE BEEN USING THESE BATH BOMBS FOR A WHILE. WE HAVE TRIED OTHERS, TOO. HOWEVER, NOTHING COMPARES TO THESE! THAT'S THE HONEST TRUTH. THE ONE THING I REALLY LIKE ABOUT THESE, AND THERE ARE MULTIPLE THINGS I LIKE, IS THAT WITHIN SECONDS THE BOMB HAS DISSOLVED. THAT HELPS TO REMOVE STRESS ASSOCIATED WITH OTHERS THAT JUST DON'T DISSOLVE. THAT'S HOW YOU KNOW YOU HAVE A GREAT BATH BOMB! THE COLORS AND FRAGRANCE OF THESE IS SOOTHING. SO, I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND TO OTHERS, ESPECIALLY IF YOU'RE SEARCHING FOR A RELAXING BATH EXPERIENCE. HAPPY SHOPPING . . .
customer_reviews.author: HAPPY SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! The packaging is beautiful: the bath bombs are individually wrapped and labelled with their scent of theme (like "lavender and vanilla" or "love") and they come in a pretty and durable box. Even without the packaging, I would recommend buying these: the scents are so strong and so lovely. I can smell them outside of our bathroom into our upstairs hallway. I have used one of the bath bombs so far, and it fizzed up really nicely. They're also a smaller size (at least compared to bath bombs from, say, Lush), but they still fill up and color the whole bath nicely, and they did not stain the tub. Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Long-Wright

customer_reviews.title: Very fragrant, great packaging good value bath bombs
customer_reviews.text: So I am a big LUSH bath bomb fan, since their beginnings. I had an Amazon gift card and am going through grief and wanted some comfort measures at home during the Corona Virus quarantine in Oregon. So based on reviews and Made in California details, I ordered this gift box for myself. They are very fragrant upon opening which I like (my master bathroom smells like a spa) but too much for one of my daughters with sensitivities. Just bear that in mind. I have used one and it was wonderful. I smelled floral the next day. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mama4ballerinas

customer_reviews.title: Kid & mom approved! Good for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old has recently fallen in love with the idea of bath bombs but she has sensitive skin & is prone to yeast infections so I did lots of research before buying any bombs for her. These bath bombs are made with natural ingredients & are lightly fragranced. The leave her skin moisturized & don't irritate her skin. She's used 2 of the bath bombs so far & hasn't had any trouble with irritation down stairs. My daughter loves the pretty bombs with the glitters & flowers. The fragrances are light enough to be age-appropriate but they do lightly linger on her skin & she still smells pretty the morning after a bath.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: My Escape to Heavan
customer_reviews.text: I ask for these bath bombs every year for Christmas. That's how much I love them. I also get them for my sister. These bath bombs have a real home-made feel and look to them. Often there is some bits of flowers on top or inside. The smell is wonderful and they are very moisturizing. These bath bombs never stain my bathtub. My favorite thing is the different names labeled on each one. To surprise myself, I will reach in the box, grab one, read the label, then throw it in the tub. I love these!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Novak

customer_reviews.title: The best bath bomb on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs are amazing! I have bought many different brands of bath bomb on Amazon and these win by a landslide. They smell amazing and leave your skin feeling silky smooth. As someone who has sensitive skin these are a great purchase. I will definitely be buying more soon. Also, be sure to clean your tub after using this product. The residue isn't as bad as other brands but to be on the safe side I would suggest cleaning the tub after using. It washes off fairly easy. No scrubbing needed. The box they come in looks professional yet cute! Vibrant coloring and amazing smells. Give them a try!
customer_reviews.author: Humble Jade

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Just wow. So let me start off with saying I've used lush bath bombs and some cheap ones from Target. We are going to ignore the target ones because they sucked. Lush bath bombs were nice, but very chalky and stained my tub. Though they are great. THESE bath bombs... Yes they are smaller than the ones from lush... But they are SO pigmented. Not chalky. Smell GREAT. And don't stain my tub. (I used the black one. So ymmv) I'm DEFINITELY buying these again and recommending them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: K. E. N.

customer_reviews.title: Great bath addition
customer_reviews.text: We never used bath bombs before, so perhaps we don’t know how to really compare, but these things are da bomb. They smell great and leave you skin feeling awesome. The ones with dried flowers in them are a little not ideal as it leaves some crud floating around while you bath. Also, none of them stained our tub expect for the yellow one. That left a yellow residue around the liner that had to be hand washed away. It did wash off though. Overall, we will happily buy again (and did)!
customer_reviews.author: Brent F.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fragrances!
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased to add into gifts so I don’t know yet how they actually function in the bath but I will comment on the things I do know. They came very nicely packaged without any damaged. If I had given them as a single gift, I could have just wrapped the box because they were already nicely arranged inside by the seller. The fragrance was absolutely amazing!! Each one smelled unique and very nice. It was very difficult to not keep them for myself. I actually may purchase these in the future for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Hurricane

customer_reviews.title: Great bath bombs, perfect for gifting!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a Mother’s Day gift for my Mom and she ABSOLUTELY loved them!! She said they made the water pretty, smelled amazing and left her skin nice and soft! The included picture was after she had already used one! The packaging was so nice looking, perfect for gift giving. I even received an email from the company right after I got these in just to make sure that everything shipped ok. I will definitely be buying more for gifts for others and of course I will have to get myself some too!!
customer_reviews.author: MaeRod

customer_reviews.title: One of the better products I've come across
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of bath bomb options out there. Some a super expensive or super cheap, but most of the time, you get a barely detected scent or some act like a fizzy bubble bath. The product from LifeAround2Angels smell amazing and if you are a fan...turn your bath water into gorgeous colors. I say all of this, but sadly, these bath bombs have turned my wife into a bath addict...but with these I can appease the monster. Thank you to LifeAround2Angels. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! At first, I bought 2 sets for my teen granddaughters for a Christmas gift. It was love at first smell when I received them and it was really hard to wrap them and give them away! Good thing I love my grandgirls!! This week I bought a set for my sister who lives for her relaxing bath getaways. She was also enchanted by the smell and bomb quality! Of course, I have ordered 2 sets for my own personal enjoyment!! When those are gone, I’ll be re-ordering! Super fast delivery, high quality, angelic products. HIGHLY recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these bath bombs
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this product several times and I love it. The smells are always great but not overwhelming, each is moisturizing, and the overall effect is relaxing. They dissolve fairly quickly, too. I also appreciate that the packaging of each bath bomb is easy to get off. I’ve used other ones that have been wrapped in plastic and are a lot more difficult to get off. These are each individually wrapped in tissue paper. My husband also loves when I use these when I do get to take a bath, because the scents linger in the bathroom for some time, so it smells good in and around the room.
customer_reviews.author: jls

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim thinking I’d save it to give as a gift. I ended up using it for myself and also my kids instead — and I LOVE it! Our skin feels amazing after using it, it does not stain our tub and the mixture of scents is to die for. I’m going to buy more for myself AND as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L Horobec

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smell but not overwhelming
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 4 year old daughter because I wanted something safe yet fun for her. She loves them! They came nicely packaged and wrapped in tissue paper. Thank you for not having them wrapped in plastic! And they're labeled with the scent. We had to smell each one a few times before she chose her favorite (rose). The scents are all wonderful and a wide variety of different ones. There isn't one that I would not use. The best thing is they are not overpowering. She ended up choosing the lavender for her first time and was so excited that little seeds/flowers came out too (only a few). I will definitely be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: D.L.  Arndt

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love these Bath Bombs
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs are top quality and I love that they are made by hand by a entrepreneurial woman. I love the idea that I am supporting her small business. I was ordering the bath bombs every two months but found that I love them so much that I've increased my order to once per month. You can immediately tell the difference between these bath bombs and the ones you get in the store. Can't say enough great things about this product. Thanks Angel Mama!
customer_reviews.author: Wonder Woman

customer_reviews.title: High quality but not natural scents
customer_reviews.text: The packaging and quality was great. They left my skin feeling moisturized and the color did not stain my tub, but I gave this product 3 stars because the scents were too strong and smelled fake. Had they been natural scents I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: technoTripp

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry pregnant skin!
customer_reviews.text: I am super impressed with these. I'm pregnant and have been having super dry skin, and these actually help moisturize my skin while I'm in the tub, and once I'm out. Most products don't seem to moisturize once I'm out and dry, but these do. It's also really nice to know they aren't filled with harmful chemicals. I'll be buying more for sure.
customer_reviews.author: RobDailey

customer_reviews.title: BUY THEM
customer_reviews.text: Loved this the moment I opened my door for Amazon. I could smell the box through the packaging and it was so lovely! Each egg is lightly scented but not overpowering. It all was natural smelling. The first one I used had glitter in it but I didn’t notice any in the bath tub or on my skin (it’s just a fun sensory experience!) I can’t wait to get to one of the floral ones to see petals floating around. I can’t imagine buying bath bombs from anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L Barett

customer_reviews.title: Smells devine
customer_reviews.text: I had this in my garage for 2 days before I brought it in my house, and its the best the garage ever smelled. I have only used the raspberry one so far. It colored the water a dark grey/black and was very fizzy (for a surprising amount of time). Did not stain my tub. Smelled awesome. The only downside is they are about half the size of a Lush bath bomb. So I fixed that problem and bought another box, and can use two at a time.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these; only had the chance to use one so far, but the scent, coloring, and how it made my skin feel was amazing. I only have one complaint... And that's that there's no way to tell which one is which scent? I mean, I can kind of guess on most of them, but it would've been nice if the letter thing inside the package had listed the scents/which were which. EDIT: Ignore me, I'm an idiot, and didn't realize they were on the specific bath bomb.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Waldron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bath bombs
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these bath bombs multiple times for birthdays and for bridesmaid gifts. Everyone seems to love them, they smell great and look really cool. Always had fast shipping and no issues with missing or broken bath bombs. I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: FlowersInSpring

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product, Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: I looked at the expensive bath bombs in "the" specialty store and couldn't believe the price.
